parameter.name: distance
parameter.paramDescription: Distance axel will travel, Default value is 1.

function.description: Action function. Axel will move forward or backward the given distance.

parameter.name: direction
parameter.paramDescription: Direction axel will turn towards, Default value is “right”.

function.description: Action function. Axel will turn to direction. Values of direction limited to “left”, “right”, and “around”.
Picks up the barrel directly in front of axel if not already holding one
If axel is holding a barrel, drop it directly in the grid space in front if there is nothing occupying the space
If axel is standing in front of a barrel, this will return how full the barrel is as a percentage value. If there is no barrel in front of axel it will return NaN
